text: 18:14: Mth 23:12; Lug 14:11Isu è yao, gu nathek shii yao, “Ai nyi è hò dun shii Pharisi shii asi pha, mijin thanpho pha ji ne Hamangkhung-aphuii rog shii rangsua rey dun. Ji-è hanyie magunde awai shii boh rek arone aishii ne ìu rey ruii phro, chiih-è hanyie magunde awai shii ìu rek arone aishii boh rab ruii phro.”
